backend/main.mo: Actor defining user profiles, habits, records, investment goals, diary entries, and access-controlled CRUD operations with internal logging and health check.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping month-selector requirements to affected frontend files and components with test IDs and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity state, profile loading, and conditional rendering of login, setup, or dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedIni: Fallback UI shown when authenticated initialization fails, offering retry, reload, and diagnostic timeline display.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: Collapsible wrapper around HabitManager that loads habits and displays a toggleable panel for managing them.
frontend/src/components/DiaryAnalyticsCh: Builds a line chart comparing diary energy levels with habit consistency for the current month. Parses diary entries, merges them with habit records, and renders using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/DiaryPage.tsx: Renders the daily reflection form with date picker, energy level, and text fields, loading and saving diary entries. Includes the analytics chart based on all diary data.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a custom fallback with reset support.
frontend/src/components/ExportDataPage.t: Provides a date‑range‑based export interface that loads data and triggers XLSX or PDF exports. Manages loading, errors, and export state.
frontend/src/components/ExportDateRangeP: A start/end date selector with popover calendars that normalizes ranges and updates parent callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ExportPreviewSec: Displays preview sections for reflections, habit records, and investments from export data, formatting entries in cards and tables.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Fallback UI for fatal errors showing the error message with options to reload or retry.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Renders a habit grid for a selected month, manages habit completion toggling and amount editing, and preserves horizontal scroll state.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides UI for creating, editing, and deleting habits, including unit selection and validation for default amounts and weekly targets.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the page header with user info, navigation tabs, view-specific icon/title, and logout menu.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentGoalCa: Shows an investment goal with progress, and provides dialogs for editing or deleting the goal.
Lists investment goals and includes a dialog for creating new goals with validation.
frontend/src/components/LoadingTimeoutFa: Fallback screen for long-loading states with backend reachability diagnostics, reload options, and copyable debug info.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen UI that triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Displays monthly target totals for applicable habits and computes progress using habit records.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Scrollable month selector tabs with drag-scroll and auto-centering of the selected month.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile creation form that saves the user’s name via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Renders monthly progress charts including pie, per‑habit bars, and daily trend data using calculated stats.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard managing views, month selection, habit data loading, and rendering habit-related components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Checks backend health by calling a healthCheck endpoint on an anonymous actor and tracks reachability state.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalDragScro: Custom React hook adding horizontal drag-to-scroll behavior using mouse events and refs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoadingWatchdog.ts: Watchdog hook that triggers a callback if a loading state persists beyond a timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreserveHorizontal: Hook that stores and restores an element’s horizontal scroll position across re-renders.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend habit, profile, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/investments.ts: Deprecated placeholder file kept for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration stub for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Empty type declaration stub for xlsx.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics.ts: In-memory diagnostics logger that records timestamped events and formats them for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/diaryAnalytics.ts: Computes daily habit consistency percentages from habit definitions and records.
frontend/src/utils/diaryDates.ts: Utilities for formatting, parsing, and retrieving dates in YYYY-MM-DD format.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses human-readable duration strings into seconds and formats seconds back to readable durations.
frontend/src/utils/exportFormatters.ts: Provides formatting helpers for dates, habit units, investment amounts, and durations.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Generates an HTML-based printable PDF report containing reflections, habit records, and other export data.
frontend/src/utils/exportXlsx.ts: Builds a tab‑delimited pseudo‑XLSX export with multiple sheets for reflections, habits, goals, and investment entries.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates export filenames and downloads blobs via a temporary link.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Utilities for creating, interpreting, and converting habit unit types for UI and logic.
frontend/src/utils/investments.ts: Formats dates and amounts for investment data and computes goal progress values.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Creates CSV content for habit records and provides a blob download helper.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Converts dates to UTC components and builds normalized date range structures.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder file for PDF report generation.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Computes report statistics including habit progress, daily stats, and volume metrics over a date range.
frontend/src/utils/steadyClimbPlan.ts: Provides monthly target lookups for the Steady Climb fitness plan and retrieves targets per habit.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins such as typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state and requirements for fixing the MonthTabs horizontal scrolling, including existing features, issues, and pending requests.
